lines.text: You just have to play that little-girl-lost routine, don't you.
I'm still feminine. I'm a Cosmo fighter.
Obviously a hardened criminal. I can tell by your kewpie-doll lips.
[Lou Ann borrows a tight-fitting dress]
Sweetheart, if there's any justice on this planet, they'll never make you give back that red dress.
I have strong feelings about gun control. If there is a gun around, I want to be controlling it.
Whadda think?
Looks like a penis to me - only smaller.
Didn't think anyone could run so fast in heels
Tina Turner taught me
Roy was just about the coolest boy in San Bernadino. About 40,000 Heineken ago
Helping you with your legal case is absolutely not my business, my job just to follow you, find you... and Federal Express you home
The three f's uh?
Through taking shit from men!
That's one thing we have in common, 'cos I'm through taking shit from men too.
Would you care for something from our complimentary minibar?
They get you half in the bag and you forget how they play these games. Well... Maybe one Cuervo. Just a short one.
Isn't it a little dangerous to put cocaine on that knife?
Cocaine is for queers and credit cards. This here is amphetamine. Only way to snort it is off a hunting knife. Want Some?
Now, if these people are going to stand here, pointing guns like this... I'm gonna ask you, are you an organ doner Alex?
Nobody shoots!
